search_input:
4.1.1 FLOOR

*The floor of the abandoned factory was covered in a thick layer of dust, with old machinery and rusty pipes scattered about. In the center of the room, a large, circular saw lay motionless on the ground. The air was thick with the scent of decay and neglect.*
suggested_query: The floor of the abandoned factory was covered in a thick layer of dust, with old machinery and rusty pipes scattered about. In the center of the room, a large, circular saw lay motionless on the ground. The air was thick with the scent of decay and neglect.
